value.name: The Sound of My Wife Breathing
value.overview: Doctor Lee Joon-Hee (Jo Yeon-Woo) divorces his wife Kim Seol-A (Choi Ja-Hye). On the day of his second marriage to Park Ka-Young (Jeon Ik-Ryung), Kim Seol-A gets into a car accident and falls into a coma. Since then, Lee Joon-Hee has taken care of his ex-wife. He recalls memories of her while he takes care of her.
